channel.title: Adding objects
channel.description:
I need some help adding objects.
I need to add something? Last time, it gave me errors...
Can someone, if I give my client.java, make it so I can add new objects?
Thanks.

item.title: Adding objects
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

Add this on client.java:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}} public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject(xcoords, ycords, objectID, facing(0 south 2 north or idk), 10); }
Then find case 121 and add: NewObjects();

Read full topic

item.title: Adding objects
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“veki94, post:2, topic:171210”][quote]Hahahahahaha!

Come to my server, and you’ll see.

I started the whole thing from scratch. I didn’t download “Testscape” or “Pimpscape”

I downloaded the basic starting source, for professional coders only!!!
So STFU. I can code better than you.

And don’t judge me, I have 183 people online at the moment, and you can’t say shit to that.

[/quote]
Lol,seems that you don’t need any help.[/quote]

I had it working at one point, but I restored my original client.java.

I didn’t lose much, but I need to re-add whatever it takes to add objects again.

If you’d help, I’d appreciate it.

Read full topic
